title: Meilisearch Quick Start
content: Meilisearch is a fast and user-friendly search engine focused on relevance, typo tolerance, and developer experience.

title: Mistral Embeddings Overview
content: Mistral embedding models transform text into vectors used for semantic search and retrieval workflows.

title: Hybrid Search Principle
content: Hybrid search combines lexical ranking and semantic similarity. The semanticRatio setting balances both signals.

title: Chunking Best Practices
content: Chunk long documents into small passages with overlap to improve retrieval quality in RAG systems.

title: Pipeline RAG simple
content: Une pipeline RAG de base contient ingestion, embeddings, indexation, retrieval puis generation de reponse.

title: Meilisearch Filters
content: Use filterableAttributes to enable filtering by category, source, or language at query time.

title: Embeddings sans LLM
content: Pour faire uniquement du retrieval semantique, un modele d embeddings suffit sans modele generatif de chat.

title: CSV to JSON mapping
content: A CSV row can be converted to one JSON document with stable id, normalized text fields, and metadata.
